catalog_info.title: Laboratory in Early Cognitive Development
catalog_info.notes: Interested students may contact Lab Coordinator Natasha Kalra, natashakalra@fas.harvard.edu
catalog_info.description: This is a laboratory methods course that provides students with hands-on experience in a cognitive development lab. The aim of the course is for students to engage in all aspects of the scientific process - from experimental design to data collection and interpretation - by working in a lab, and by participating in weekly meetings where key questions and findings in the field are discussed.
